items-create-summary:
Summary used when creating an item data module.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
items-revert-summary:
Summary used when reverting changes to an item data module or forced to downgrade.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
items-update-summary:
Summary used when updating an item data module.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
items-create-list-summary:
Summary used when creating a list with item data.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
items-revert-list-summary:
Summary used when reverting changes to a list with item data or forced to downgrade.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
items-update-list-summary:
Summary used when updating a list with item data.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
items-create-keys-summary: Summary used when creating a list of keys/aliases.
items-update-keys-summary: Summary used when updating a list of keys/aliases.
items-create-updates-summary: Summary used when creating a list of last update version per item
items-update-updates-summary: Summary used when updating a list of last update version per item
